items.title: From silicon to sentience: The legacy guiding AI’s next frontier and human cognitive migration
items.description: As AI systems master tasks once uniquely human, we find ourselves on an accelerated journey to discover what truly lies beyond automation.

items.title: MCP and the innovation paradox: Why open standards will save AI from itself
items.description: Much like HTTP and REST standardized how web applications connect to services, MCP standardizes how AI models connect to tools.

items.title: Fine-tuning vs. in-context learning: New research guides better LLM customization for real-world tasks
items.description: By combining fine-tuning and in-context learning, you get LLMs that can learn tasks that would be too difficult or expensive for either method

items.title: What your tools miss at 2:13 AM: How gen AI attack chains exploit telemetry lag – Part 1
items.description: Explore a strategic 2025 roadmap for cybersecurity leaders to tackle gen AI, insider risks, and team burnout with actionable guidance.
